metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2219 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Red Hat Directory Server before 8.2.11-13 and 389 Directory Server do not properly restrict access to entity attributes, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via a search query for the attribute.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2219` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.3.2.11-0ubuntu1
389-ds-base - 1.3.2.11-0ubuntu1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.3.2.11-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.2.11-0ubuntu1').
